fields.title: Mortgages from Credit Unions
fields.content:
During 2023, credit unions have started to extend ther reach into provision of mortgages.  This is good news for customers, as it means a cohort of people who would not have readily been able to access mortgage and lending services, now have this access in a way that could be considered more accessible than the high-street banks.

Not all credit unions offer mortgages, follow this link to open a new window with a list of credit unions which offer mortgages, by county .

To find your closest credit union follow this link.

Note that many credit unions are currently restricted to customers within a geographic catchment area  determined basd on where the customer lives, or where the customer works.  Find out more about becoming a member here.


  #Purchase a Property
fields.excerpt: -- News :  MORTGAGES now availlable from certain credit unions!! --
